definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The legislative intent of the Basic Law was clear and there was no need for an interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 基本法的立法原意明确，故无须释法。

sentences.english: Those who are wealthier are not willing to risk and lose.
sentences.chinese: 而那些较富裕的人也不原意冒险而遭受损失。

sentences.english: Now God only knows what this parable actually means.
sentences.chinese: 现在只有上帝知道这个寓言的原意是什么了。

sentences.english: A two-year term was consistent with the Basic Law's legislative intent.
sentences.chinese: 两年任期符合基本法的立法原意。

sentences.english: The most common reasons for decreasing quality grade were rot and knots.
sentences.chinese: 质量等级降低最通常的原意就是腐烂和节疤。

sentences.english: I am sorry if you have misunderstood my message by subjective interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉地说，您主观臆断，曲解了我文章的原意。

sentences.english: Possibly his original intention was simply to cover marvel's retreat.
sentences.chinese: 也许他原意很简单，就是想隐藏这个世外桃源。

sentences.english: Faithful to the English name intended to have the international brand of style.
sentences.chinese: 忠实于英文原意才有国际大品牌的风范。

sentences.english: I asked if anyone wanted to go with me.
sentences.chinese: 我问其他人愿不原意和我一起去，可没人愿意。

sentences.english: Not many people are willing to compromise when dealing with a grump.
sentences.chinese: 与坏脾气的人交易，很多人不原意让步。

sentences.english: You have to be wiling to communicate through the same tools that others are using.
sentences.chinese: 你的原意去用其他人的交流方式和他们交流。

sentences.english: However, the balance wheel metaphor has another, perhaps unintended meaning.
sentences.chinese: 但是，平衡轮的比喻还有另一个或许并非初衷的原意。

sentences.english: It originally means dimond-bracelet. Make it with Vodka or Jin and sour orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 原意是手钻，以伏特加或金酒加酸橙汁调制。

sentences.english: The high acoustical rating ensures that your flexible space functions as originally intended.
sentences.chinese: 高音质评价确保您的灵活空间职能原意。

sentences.english: is an adaptation from a a Japanese word meaning blur.
sentences.chinese: Bokeh一词来自日文，原意指模糊不清或是污点。

sentences.english: This explanatory note seems to be closer to what is ment by the author.
sentences.chinese: 这样注解比较切近作者原意。

definition: meaning (of foreign expression)/translation of the meaning (as opposed to literal translation 直譯|直译)/paraphrase/free translation
idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
